title: You Sunk for Android Wear

Your mission is to:- Sink all battleships- Don't sink friendly ships- Avoid enemy torpedoesFeatures:- 5 types of weapons:  - Torpedo  - Auto guiding torpedo  - Auto guiding rocket  - Electro-magnetic impulse  - Nuclear rocket- 3 types of enemy boats and additional friendly boat- 3 different time settings: Night, Dawn, Day- Upgrade armor shield of your submarine and upgrade speed of your torpedoesDefeat your enemies and win the war!
descriptionHTML:
Now on Android Wear!

You are captain of a submarine on a secret mission behind enemy lines.

Your mission is to:
- Sink all battleships
- Don't sink friendly ships
- Avoid enemy torpedoes

Features:
- 5 types of weapons:
- Torpedo
- Auto guiding torpedo
- Auto guiding rocket
- Electro-magnetic impulse
- Nuclear rocket
- 3 types of enemy boats and additional friendly boat
- 3 different time settings: Night, Dawn, Day
- Upgrade armor shield of your submarine and upgrade speed of your torpedoes

Defeat your enemies and win the war!

Best game I played on Android Wear! Works great on my SmartWatch 3! It's awesome!
